title: SMC_GSentenceQueue (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GSentenceQueue
The sentence queue transports the g-code sentences read using
|SMC_ReadNCFromStram|
or
SMC_ReadNCFile2
to the interpreter
(
SMC_NCInterpreter
).

AddDataSpaceLeft
